SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.nuklear

Class NkDrawList

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.nuklear.NkDrawList
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class NkDrawList extends Struct implements NativeResource

Layout


 struct nk_draw_list {
     struct nk_rect clip_rect;
     struct nk_vec2 circle_vtx[12];
     struct nk_convert_config config;
     struct nk_buffer * buffer;
     struct nk_buffer * vertices;
     struct nk_buffer * elements;
     unsigned int element_count;
     unsigned int vertex_count;
     unsigned int cmd_count;
     nk_size cmd_offset;
     unsigned int path_count;
     unsigned int path_offset;
     enum nk_anti_aliasing line_AA;
     enum nk_anti_aliasing shape_AA;
     nk_handle userdata;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • NkDrawList

      public NkDrawList(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a NkDrawList instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
